intro: Kaluhaburunghos stipulatus, commonly known as the leafy-stippled orchid, is a flowering plant belonging to the Orchidaceae family. It is characterized by its distinctive foliage, which features prominent stipules along the leaf stalks. The plant produces striking, fragrant flowers that are typically pink or white in color. It thrives in humid, shaded environments, often found in tropical and subtropical regions. Its unique botanical traits make it a sought-after species in horticulture and botanical gardens.
